reviewText: Wow ... I swear I read some where there were english subtitles ...since I don't speak German or read Spanish I am out of luck ...such a shame because it looks pretty good
It makes Beethoven less of a deity and more of a man while respecting his genius.  The tragedy of his deafness is unimaginable.
The production looks excellent and hearing Beethoven in german is really effective. BUT, The language is spoken German and the sub titles are in spanish---and I boughtit as is. wheres my gun?
